bibl.title: Greek Medical Papyri from the Fayum Village of Tebtunis: Patient Involvement in a Local Health-Care System?
bibl.note: Introduction. - Papyri of medical content discovered at Tebtunis. - Comparison of the residents of Tebtunis, Socnopaeu Nesus and Karanis. - Patient involvement in the health-care system of Tebtunis.

bibl.title: "Hippocrates in Context. Papers read at the XIth International Hippocrates Colloquium. University of Newcastle upon Tyne, 27-31 August 2002."

bibl.seg: Ann Ellis Hanson, Greek Medical Papyri from the Fayum Village of Tebtunis: Patient Involvement in a Local Health-Care System?
Philip J. van der Eijk (ed.), Hippocrates in Context. Papers read at the XIth International Hippocrates Colloquium. University of Newcastle upon Tyne, 27-31 August 2002 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 387-402.
Introduction. - Papyri of medical content discovered at Tebtunis. - Comparison of the residents of Tebtunis, Socnopaeu Nesus and Karanis. - Patient involvement in the health-care system of Tebtunis.
